Check if a membership level is free.

Returns
Boolean.

Returns
Boolean. (if all levels querying are free)

Boolean.

$level (obj) The level's object you are querying.

$short (bool) Show short price description.

Returns
String (Date).

See if a user has a certain membership level or any level. (Leave blank to check against all levels for current user.) 

Parameters
$levels (array) The membership(s) level ID.
$user_id (int) Specific user ID to check against. 

Returns
Boolean.
